metadata.title: CVE-2017-12799 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The elf_read_notesfunction in bfd/elf.c in GNU Binutils 2.29 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted binary file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
